creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: rare; white plain weave ground with red, yellow, purple bands of designs (geometric and figures) dominate upper half front and back; lower half--technique of cut weft patterning with trees and figures (white); white gathered lace collar and short lace sleeves in white; collar has finished seam at center front
dimension:
35 x 62 in. (88.9 x 157.48 cm) (including sleeves)
9 1/2 in. (24.13 cm) (object part, sleeve length)
9 in. (22.86 cm) (object part, collar width)
